noetic8 wrote:

> --- In junit@yahoogroups.com <mailto:junit%40yahoogroups.com>, "J. B. 
> Rainsberger" <jbrains762@...> wrote:
>  >
>  > Simon Chappell wrote:
>  >
>  > > Is this new? I thought that when I checked out HtmlUnit a couple
> of years
>  > > ago, it was built on top of HttpUnit, but I have a very bad
> memory! In light
>  > > of your information I will take a fresh look at HtmlUnit. Thank you.
>  >
>  > HtmlUnit builds on the Apache http-client, not HttpUnit. It's jWebUnit
>  > that builds on HttpUnit.
> 
> Actually, JWebUnit is now also built on HtmlUnit. It was previously
> based on HttpUnit.

Neat. I didn't know that. Good for HtmlUnit.
